boardgame.name: Funkenschlag
boardgame.description: Players draw electrical networks on the board connecting various cities and then power them by purchasing power plants and the resources to run the plants._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This is the first edition of the game, published only by 2F Spiele. Several changes were made (payout schedule, fixed board, etc.) to create Funkenschlag Second Edition (aka Power Grid)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2002 International Gamers Awards - General Strategy; Multi-player Nominee

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Never played, good as new! This is the original 2F edition of the game. In order to pay with PayPal, you must have a balance on your account (no credit cards).

No. 82 of the limited first edition of Funkenschlag. Game has never been played. No shrinkwrap, but game doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t come with shrinkwrap originally. Usually shipping a single (regular sized) boardgame (surface) costs 12.90€ worldwide and 8.60€ within Europe. Smaller games ship cheaper. Of course multiple games can be combined.

Everything_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s in the box, including some Vis-A-Vis pens I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve added. The only caveat is that I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve carefully cut the original paper/plasticky board in half, so that it lies flat in the box. Also, I scanned the board and laminated the scans onto a folding board. Finally, there_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s also another scan that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s simply laminated. Still, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s the same great game it always has been, in really good shape.
Original German First Edition. great condition for this extremely hard to find game. Grab up with stellar pre-cursor to Power Grid, and see the difference a crayon can make!

Funkenschlag, the original German version of Power Grid. Completely language-independent, and a printout of the English Rules are included. This is a used copy. Cover nicked up but game has never been played. First edition -- never played Game is in mint condition and is complete and sorted (in mini-ziplocs, except if there is a sorting tray). I need to make space and get rid of games I am unlikely to play in the future. Please check my other listings! If you buy more than US$100 worth of games, I will give $10 off shipping. This listing is for a copy of Funkenschlag First Edition. Game is in good condition. The board and resource market have been mounted on an old monopoly board for durability by previous owner. All components present in original box. Also includes a copy of printed English rules (also available on BGG). Buyer pays 13.65 for USPS Priority Mail shipping, or, if combined with other games, actual shipping via USPS Priority from zip code 46143. I only accept PayPal and only ship to the US.

I sell Funkenschlag von 2F Spiele, 1st edition. The game has been played only once, components are in top condition and complete. non-smoker household, no pets. If you live in Germany you can pick up the game in Duisburg and pay cash, otherwise the buyer pays the shipping costs, only bank transfer.
Includes printout of English rules, very nice English paste ups of the player aids, additional laminated map and laminated large English play mat. Extra wet erase markers included.
